name: Earths's Redemption
description:
EARTH'S REDEMPTION

Earths Redemption is a platformer that was made by a group of 5 people at London South Bank University, the game was made in 10 weeks and was for most of the group the first game they had made,

In this game your aim is to collect the objects scattered around the map before the time runs out and then get to the teleport pad, each pickup will give you more time.

Controls :

W,A,S,D or the Arrow Keys to move left right up and down.

You can use the SpaceBar to time travel between the past and present, but the past is unstable and you can only stay in the past for a few seconds.

Credits:

Jami Dorozala -  Producer , Deputy Technical Director, Deputy Art Director and Animator

Oliver Smith - Technical Director and QA Director.

Ian Awity - Audio Director

Khadija Ahmed - Art Director
